content.buttonTooltip: Layers are listed by their edit status.

dockPane.caption: Active Tool
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open a map to get started.

dockPane.caption: Attributes
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open a map to get started.

dockPane.caption: Rematch Addresses
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Add a geocoded feature class to the map to get started.

dockPane.caption: Create Features
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open a map to get started.

dockPane.caption: Modify Features
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open a map to get started.

dockPane.caption: Manage Templates
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Open a map to get started.

dockPane.caption: Error Inspector
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Select a map that contains error layers.

dockPane.caption: Manage Records
dockPane.delayLoadMessage: Select a map that contains a parcel fabric.

button.caption: Start Editing
button.extendedCaption: Start editing.
button.tooltip: Start editing data.

button.caption: Stop Editing
button.extendedCaption: Stop editing.
button.tooltip: Stop editing data.

button.caption: Start Editing
button.extendedCaption: Start editing.
button.tooltip: Start editing data.

button.caption: Save
button.extendedCaption: Save edits.
button.tooltip: Save all edits made since the last save. After saving, you cannot undo previous editing operations.

tool.caption: Create 3D Geometry
tool.tooltip: Sketch a new multipatch geometry on the scene.Requires a local scene view.

tool.caption: Modify 3D Geometry
tool.tooltip: Edit a multipatch geometry on the scene.Requires a local scene view.

button.caption: Discard
button.extendedCaption: Discard edits.
button.tooltip: Discard all unsaved edits.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete selected features.
button.tooltip: Delete the selected features.

button.caption: Delete (Shortcut)
button.extendedCaption: Delete selected features (Shortcut).
button.tooltip: Delete the selected features.

button.caption: Attributes
button.extendedCaption: Show Attributes pane.
button.tooltip: Show the Attributes pane. This allows you to view and edit the attributes of selected features.

button.caption: Create
button.extendedCaption: Show Create Features pane.
button.tooltip: Show the Create Features pane. This allows you to create new features in the current map using templates.

button.caption: Modify
button.extendedCaption: Show Modify Features pane.
button.tooltip: Show the Modify Features pane. This allows you to access commands and tools for modifying features.

button.caption: Templates
button.extendedCaption: Show Manage Templates pane.
button.tooltip: Manage and customize the feature templates in the current project.

button.caption: Status
button.extendedCaption: Show Editing Status dialog.
button.tooltip: View permissions, warnings, and version status for the maps, layers, and related data in your project.

button.caption: All Tools...
button.extendedCaption: Show Modify Features pane.
button.tooltip: Access commands and tools for modifying features.

button.caption: Switch Gallery Size
button.extendedCaption: Switch Modify Features pane gallery size.
button.tooltip: Switch between small and large icons.

button.caption: Customize...
button.extendedCaption: Tool gallery
button.tooltip: Add groups, reorder, or remove the tools in the Tool gallery.

button.caption: Editing
button.extendedCaption: Show List by Editing view of Contents pane.
button.tooltip: Show layers in the table of contents by whether they're editable.

button.caption: Make this the only editable layer
button.extendedCaption: Highlighted layer as only editable layer.
button.tooltip: Makes the highlighted layer the only editable layer in the map.

button.caption: Stop showing the constant elevation plane
Restart showing the constant elevation plane

tool.caption: Get Point Tool
tool.tooltip: Get the location of a point feature.

tool.caption: Trace Traverse Tool
tool.tooltip: Trace Traverse.

tool.caption: Point Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a point feature.

tool.caption: Multipoint Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipoint feature.

tool.caption: Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a line feature.

tool.caption: 2 Point Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Creates a finished two-point polyline feature.

tool.caption: Right Angle Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a line feature with right angles.

tool.caption: Radial Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a series of line features originating from a common center.

tool.caption: Circle Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a finished circular polyline feature.

tool.caption: Rectangle Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a finished square or rectangular polyline feature.

tool.caption: Ellipse Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a finished elliptical polyline feature.

tool.caption: Freehand Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a line that follows the movement of your pointer.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Trace Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Create segments by tracing an existing feature. Press O to access options.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Trace Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a polygon by tracing the shape of another feature. Press O to access options.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a polygon feature.

tool.caption: Right Angle Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a polygon feature with right angles.

tool.caption: Circle Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a finished circular polygon feature.

tool.caption: Rectangle Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a finished square or rectangular polygon feature.

tool.caption: Ellipse Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a finished elliptical polygon feature.

tool.caption: Freehand Polygon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a polygon that follows the movement of your pointer.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Point At End of Line Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a point feature using a temporary line as an offset.

tool.caption: AutoComplete Polygons Tool
tool.tooltip: Create an adjoining polygon using an existing polygon in the same layer to complete the coincident edges.

tool.caption: AutoComplete Freehand Polygons Tool
tool.tooltip: Create an adjoining polygon using an existing polygon on the same layer to complete the coincident edges.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Horizontal Annotation Tool
tool.tooltip: Create horizontal annotation.

tool.caption: Straight Annotation Tool
tool.tooltip: Create straight annotation.

tool.caption: Curved Annotation Tool
tool.tooltip: Create curved annotation.

tool.caption: Follow Feature Annotation Tool
tool.tooltip: Create annotation that constrains its location relative to the edge of a feature.

tool.caption: Aligned
tool.tooltip: Create aligned dimension.

tool.caption: Simple Aligned
tool.tooltip: Create simple aligned dimension.

tool.caption: Linear
tool.tooltip: Create linear dimension.

tool.caption: Rotated Linear
tool.tooltip: Create rotated linear dimension.

tool.caption: Free Linear
tool.tooltip: Create linear dimension.

tool.caption: Free Aligned
tool.tooltip: Create aligned dimension.

button.caption: Move
button.extendedCaption: Move selected features.
button.tooltip: Move the selected features.

button.caption: Rotate
button.extendedCaption: Rotate selected features.
button.tooltip: Rotate the selected features.

button.caption: Scale
button.extendedCaption: Scale selected features.
button.tooltip: Scale the selected features.

button.caption: Transform
button.extendedCaption: Transform feature's based on links.
button.tooltip: Transform features to a new location using displacement vectors.

tool.caption: Transform
tool.tooltip: Transform features to a new location using displacement vectors.

button.caption: Vertices
button.extendedCaption: Edit feature vertices.
button.tooltip: Add, move, or delete vertices and segments for the selected feature.

tool.caption: Reshape
tool.tooltip: Reshape an existing line or polygon feature by drawing the new shape and crossing the existing feature in at least two places.

button.caption: Reshape
button.extendedCaption: Reshape features.
button.tooltip: Reshape an existing line or polygon feature by drawing the new shape and crossing the existing feature in at least two places.

button.caption: Annotation
button.extendedCaption: Edit Annotation features
button.tooltip: Edit Annotation features.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Replace Geometry
button.extendedCaption: Replace selected feature's geometry.
button.tooltip: Replace the entire shape of a selected point, line, or polygon while maintaining its attribute values. Snap or trace to align the new shape with other features.

tool.caption: Replace Multipatch
tool.tooltip: Replace the geometry of one or more multipatch features.

tool.caption: Multipatch Texture
tool.tooltip: Apply colors and textures to multipatch features on the scene.Requires a local scene view.

button.caption: Multipatch Texture
button.extendedCaption: Multipatch Texture Tool
button.tooltip: Apply colors and textures to multipatch features on the scene.Requires a local scene view.

button.caption: Continue Feature
button.extendedCaption: Continue sketching a feature in edit vertices mode.
button.tooltip: Continue sketching vertices.

button.caption: Clip
button.extendedCaption: Clip features.
button.tooltip: Clip all editable and visible features that touch or are within a buffered distance from selected features.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Replace Multipatch
button.extendedCaption: Replace a multipatch.
button.tooltip: Replace the geometry of one or more multipatch features.

button.caption: Continue Feature
button.extendedCaption: Continue sketching a feature.
button.tooltip: Continue sketching the selected feature.

button.caption: Traverse
button.extendedCaption: Create features by entering a traverse.
button.tooltip: Create features by entering a traverse.

button.caption: Traverse Options...
button.tooltip: Set options for the traverse tool.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to the current course within traverse.
button.tooltip: Zoom in and center the map on the current course.

button.caption: Pan To
button.extendedCaption: Pan to the current course within traverse.
button.tooltip: Pan the map to the current course.

button.caption: Flash
button.extendedCaption: Flash in map the current course within traverse
button.tooltip: Flash the shape of the course in the map.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete this course in the traverse.
button.tooltip: Delete current course from the traverse.

button.caption: Insert Before
button.extendedCaption: Insert course before.
button.tooltip: Insert new course before the currently selected one.

button.caption: Insert After
button.extendedCaption: Insert course after.
button.tooltip: Insert new course after the currently selected one.

button.caption: Set closing location before this course
button.extendedCaption: Set closing location before this course.

tooltip.heading: Set closing location before this course

button.tooltip: Set closing location before this course.

button.caption: Set closing location after this course
button.extendedCaption: Set closing location after this course.

tooltip.heading: Set closing location after this course

button.tooltip: Set closing location after this course.

tool.caption: Extend or Trim
tool.tooltip: Extend or trim polyline features and terminate them where they touch another feature.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Extend or Trim
button.extendedCaption: Extends or Trims Line Features.
button.tooltip: Extend or trim polyline features and terminate them where they touch another feature.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Fillet
tool.tooltip: Create a tangent curve connecting two segments.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Fillet
button.extendedCaption: Fillet Features.
button.tooltip: Create a tangent curve connecting two segments.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: Right Angle
tool.tooltip: Simplifies the shape of selected features.

button.caption: Generalize
button.tooltip: Simplifies the shape of selected features.

tool.caption: Buffer
tool.tooltip: Buffer traverses each of the input feature's vertices and creates buffer offsets. Output buffer features are created from those offsets.

button.caption: Buffer
button.extendedCaption: Creates buffer polygons around input features to a specified distance.
button.tooltip: Buffer traverses each of the input feature's vertices and creates buffer offsets. Output buffer features are created from those offsets.

tool.caption: Copy Parallel
tool.tooltip: Create parallel offset copies of selected line features.

button.caption: Copy Parallel
button.extendedCaption: Creates parallel offset copies of selected features.
button.tooltip: Create parallel offset copies of selected line features.

tool.caption: Split Line
tool.tooltip: Split a line into two line features by clicking.

tool.caption: Split
tool.tooltip: Divide a polyline or polygon feature into two features along a splitting line you create across the feature. Click a polyline segment to divide the feature without using a splitting line.

button.caption: Split
button.extendedCaption: Split features.
button.tooltip: Divide a polyline or polygon feature into two features along a splitting line you create across the feature. Click a polyline segment to divide the feature without using a splitting line.

tool.caption: Divide
tool.tooltip: Divide a polyline or polygon feature.

button.caption: Divide
button.extendedCaption: Divide features.
button.tooltip: Divide a polyline or polygon feature.

tool.caption: Right Angle
tool.tooltip: Make an angle into a right angle by clicking.

button.caption: Right Angle
button.extendedCaption: Right Angle
button.tooltip: Make an angle into a right angle by clicking.

tool.caption: Align Edge
tool.tooltip: Align a topological edge to its nearest face by clicking.

button.caption: Align Edge
button.extendedCaption: Align topological edges.
button.tooltip: Align a topological edge to its nearest face by clicking.Enable topology to use this tool.

tool.caption: Align Features
tool.tooltip: Align Features closes gaps between adjacent polyline or polygon features using a traced line and a buffer tolerance.

button.caption: Align Features
button.extendedCaption: Align features.
button.tooltip: Align Features closes gaps between adjacent polyline or polygon features using a traced line and a buffer tolerance.

tool.caption: Modify Edge
tool.tooltip: Align a topological edge to its nearest face by clicking.

tool.caption: Reshape Edge
tool.tooltip: Reshape a topological edge.

tool.caption: Select Topology
tool.tooltip: Select a topology element.

button.caption: Stretch Topology
button.tooltip: Toggle Stretch Topology.

button.caption: Disconnect
button.tooltip: Disconnect network features for move.

tool.caption: Split
tool.tooltip: Split existing lines and polygons by drawing a line across them.

tool.caption: Planarize
tool.tooltip: Split selected line features where they intersect and remove any coincident line segments.

tool.caption: Fix Error
tool.tooltip: Topology fix operations for a selected error.

button.caption: Planarize
button.extendedCaption: Planarize lines.
button.tooltip: Split selected line features where they intersect and remove any coincident line segments.

tool.caption: Move To
tool.tooltip: Moves features to a new coordinate location or by an offset distance.

button.caption: Move To
button.extendedCaption: Move features
button.tooltip: Moves features to a new coordinate location or by an offset distance.

tool.caption: Explode
tool.tooltip: Separate selected multipart features into individual features. These parts become independent features and are assigned identical attributes.

button.caption: Explode
button.extendedCaption: Explode Features
button.tooltip: Separate selected multipart features into individual features. These parts become independent features and are assigned identical attributes.

tool.caption: Explode
tool.tooltip: Separate selected multipart features into individual features. These parts become independent features and are assigned identical attributes.

tool.caption: Construct Polygons
tool.tooltip: Create new polygons from the shapes of selected line features.

button.caption: Construct Polygons
button.extendedCaption: Construct Polygons
button.tooltip: Create new polygons from the shapes of selected line features.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Merge
button.extendedCaption: Merge features.
button.tooltip: Merge two or more features into an existing feature or union two or more features into a new feature.

button.caption: Copy Lines To
button.tooltip: Copy selected parcels or lines to the parcel type chosen on the Copy Lines To dialog box. Use the copied features to create new parcels in the active record.Available only when an active record is set.

button.caption: Validate All
button.tooltip: Identify parcel errors and symbolize them on layers in the current map.

button.caption: Validate Extent
button.tooltip: Identify parcel errors and symbolize them on layers in the current map extent.

button.caption: Build
button.extendedCaption: Build parcel related features.
button.tooltip: Fix Errors by building parcels.

button.caption: Change Parcel Type
button.tooltip: Move the selected parcels to the parcel type chosen on the Change Parcel Type dialog box.

button.caption: Duplicate Parcels
button.tooltip: Duplicate the selected parcels to the parcel type chosen on the Duplicate Parcels dialog box.

button.caption: Set Historic
button.tooltip: Sets all selected parcels as historic. All selected parcels will be retired by the current active record.This command is currently disabled. Set Historic is enabled when there is an active record.

button.caption: Set Current
button.tooltip: Sets all selected parcels as current. All selected parcels will have the retired by record ID cleared.

tool.caption: Duplicate Vertical
tool.tooltip: Duplicate Z-aware features.

button.caption: Duplicate Vertical
button.extendedCaption: Duplicate Z-aware features.
button.tooltip: Duplicate Z-aware features.

button.caption: Duplicate Vertical
button.extendedCaption: Duplicate Z-aware features (map context menu item).
button.tooltip: Duplicate Z-aware features.

tool.caption: Split
tool.tooltip: Create a line feature across an existing line on the same layer and split both lines where they intersect.

tool.caption: Modify
tool.tooltip: Add, move, or delete vertices and segments for the selected feature.

button.caption: Line
button.extendedCaption: Sketch lines on the map.
button.tooltip: Sketch lines on the map.

button.caption: Point
button.extendedCaption: Sketch points on the map.
button.tooltip: Sketch points on the map.

button.caption: Midpoint
button.extendedCaption: Midpoint Constructor
button.tooltip: Create a point or vertex at the midpoint of a line segment.

button.caption: Line at right angle
button.extendedCaption: Sketch lines with right angle on the map.
button.tooltip: Sketch lines with right angle on the map.

button.caption: Arc Segment
button.extendedCaption: Sketch line segment as an arc on the map.
button.tooltip: Create a circular arc by setting the start point the location where the curve passes, and the end point. Press R to enter a radius.

button.caption: End Point Arc Segment
button.extendedCaption: Sketch line segment as an end of arc on the map.
button.tooltip: Create a circular arc segment by placing the start and end points of the curve and defining a radius. Press R to enter a radius.

button.caption: Tangent Curve Segment
button.extendedCaption: Sketch line segment as a tangent curve on the map.
button.tooltip: Create a circular arc tangent to the previous segment.

button.caption: Bezier Curve Segment
button.extendedCaption: Sketch line segment as a Bezier curve on the map.
button.tooltip: Create a smooth Bezier curve where the shape is defined by two vertices and a handle that radiates from each vertex.

button.caption: Trace
button.extendedCaption: Create a new feature by tracing existing features.
button.tooltip: Trace existing features on the map. Press O to access options.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Streaming
button.extendedCaption: Stream vertices from mouse movement.
button.tooltip: Turn on stream mode editing so vertices are placed at an interval as you move around the map. Click the map to stop streaming temporarily, then click again to start creating verticesThis tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Streaming
button.extendedCaption: Stream vertices from mouse movement.
button.tooltip: Turn on stream mode editing so vertices are placed at an interval as you move around the map. Click the map to stop streaming temporarily, then click again to start creating verticesThis tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Show Vertices
button.extendedCaption: Toggle showing vertices near mouse.
button.tooltip: Toggle Show Vertices.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Show Vertices
button.extendedCaption: show vertices near mouse.
button.tooltip: Enable Show Vertices.This tool is not available in 3D views.

button.caption: Hide Vertices
button.extendedCaption: Toggle showing vertices near mouse.
button.tooltip: Disable Show Vertices.This tool is not available in 3D views.

tool.caption: MultiPatch Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch feature by clicking a location after choosing a model file.

tool.caption: Cube Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch cube feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Cylinder Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch cylinder feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Sphere Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch sphere feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Cone Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch cone feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Tetrahedron Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch tetrahedron feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Hexagon Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch hexagon feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Diamond Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch diamond feature by clicking a location.

tool.caption: Sphere Frame Tool
tool.tooltip: Create a multipatch sphere frame feature by clicking a location.

button.caption: Create Points Along Line
button.extendedCaption: Create points along an existing line.
button.tooltip: Create point features along a line.

button.caption: Select all
button.extendedCaption: Select entire text.
button.tooltip: Select the entire annotation text.

button.caption: Underline
button.extendedCaption: Underline selected text.
button.tooltip: Underline selected text.

button.caption: All Caps
button.extendedCaption: All Caps
button.tooltip: All Caps

button.caption: Small Caps
button.extendedCaption: Small Caps
button.tooltip: Small Caps

button.caption: Superscript
button.extendedCaption: Superscript selected text.
button.tooltip: Superscript selected text.

button.caption: Subscript
button.extendedCaption: Subscript selected text.
button.tooltip: Subscript selected text.

button.caption: Find Text
button.tooltip: Replace the text string with the label expression from the topmost selected feature layer. Selecting feature-linked annotation calculates the text only from the origin feature class. Press the N key to cycle through the possible text strings.

button.caption: Cycle through
button.extendedCaption: Cycle through all items returned by Find Text tool
button.tooltip: Cycle through all items returned by Find Text tool.

button.caption: Finish
button.extendedCaption: Finish feature sketch.
button.tooltip: Apply the changes and complete the current operation.

button.caption: Finish Part
button.extendedCaption: Finish feature sketch part.
button.tooltip: Start a new sketch part.

button.caption: Cancel
button.extendedCaption: Discard sketch changes and exit operation.
button.tooltip: Discard the changes and exit the current operation.

button.caption: Angle...
button.tooltip: Rotate by an angle.

button.caption: Scale...
button.tooltip: Apply a scale factor.

button.caption: Trace Options...
button.tooltip: Set tracing options, including setting an offset and specifying how corners should appear.

button.caption: Streaming Options...
button.tooltip: Set streaming options.

button.caption: Direction...
button.tooltip: Draw the segment at a specified angular direction.

button.caption: Deflection...
button.tooltip: Draw the segment at a specified angle from the last segment.

button.caption: Distance...
button.tooltip: Draw the segment at a specified distance from the last vertex.

button.caption: Direction/Distance...
button.tooltip: Add a vertex point at the angle and the distance specified.

button.caption: Radius...
button.tooltip: Draw a circle with a specified radius.

button.caption: Set Radius...
button.tooltip: Type a value for the fillet curve fixed radius.

button.caption: Fixed Radius
button.tooltip: Set the current curve as the fixed radius value. Click this command again to turn off the fixed radius or set another value.

button.caption: Width...
button.tooltip: Draw a rectangle with a specified width.

button.caption: Height...
button.tooltip: Draw a rectangle with a specified height.

button.caption: Height...
button.tooltip: Pull the face a specified distance.

button.caption: Width...
button.tooltip: Draw an ellipse with a specified width.

button.caption: Height...
button.tooltip: Draw an ellipse with a specified height.

button.caption: Parallel
button.tooltip: Draw the segment parallel to the right-clicked segment.

button.caption: Perpendicular
button.tooltip: Draw the segment perpendicular to the right-clicked segment.

button.caption: Segment Deflection...
button.tooltip: Draw the segment at a specified angle from the right-clicked segment.

button.caption: Vertical
button.tooltip: Set the z coordinate.

button.caption: Absolute X,Y,Z...
button.tooltip: Add a vertex point at the specified x,y,z location.

button.caption: Delta X,Y,Z...
button.tooltip: Add a vertex point at the specified x,y,z location.

button.caption: Change Length...
button.tooltip:
Extend or Trim the line to the specified length.
Trim: A positive value less than the line length measures the new length from the first vertex. A negative value less than the line length trims the specified length from the last vertex.
Extend: A positive value greater than the line length measures the new length from the first vertex. A negative value greater than than the line length measures the new length from the last vertex

button.caption: Reverse Direction
button.tooltip: Change the direction of the sketch. The first point added to the sketch becomes the last point.

button.caption: Replace Sketch...
button.tooltip: Replace the shape of the sketch with the geometry of the topmost visible feature where you right-click

button.caption: Add Vertex
button.tooltip: Add a vertex at the right-clicked location.

button.caption: Delete Vertex
button.tooltip: Delete the right-clicked vertex.

button.caption: Move...
button.tooltip: Move vertex or vertices to the x,y distance specified.

button.caption: Move To...
button.tooltip: Move vertex to the x,y,z location specified.

button.caption: Square and Finish
button.tooltip: Square and finish the sketch.

button.caption: Normal
button.extendedCaption: Select vertices of feature in edit vertices mode.
button.tooltip: Drag a vertex or segment. To exit this mode, click Finish or another command.

button.caption: Add
button.extendedCaption: Add vertices to feature in edit vertices mode.
button.tooltip: Click a segment to add a vertex. To exit this mode, click Finish or another command.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete vertices from feature in edit vertices mode.
button.tooltip: Click a vertex to delete it. To exit this mode, click Finish or another command.

button.caption: Revert changes
button.extendedCaption: Revert template attribute overrides in Create Features pane.
button.tooltip: Restore this value to the value defined by the source data.This command is disabled if the template does not have any overrides.

button.caption: Save As
button.extendedCaption: Save template as a new template.

tooltip.heading: Save a copy of this template

button.tooltip: Create a new template using this template's properties.

button.caption: Properties
button.extendedCaption: Open template properties.
button.tooltip: Change the template settings, including tools, description, tags, and more.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete a Feature Template.
button.tooltip: Delete the selected template.

button.caption: Duplicate
button.extendedCaption: Duplicate a template.
button.tooltip: Copy the selected template.

button.caption: Follow this Feature
button.extendedCaption: Follow this Feature

button.caption: Flash Feature
button.extendedCaption: Flash Feature

button.caption: Zoom to Feature
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to Feature

button.caption: Pan to Feature
button.extendedCaption: Pan to Feature

button.caption: Add Leader
button.extendedCaption: Add Leader
button.tooltip: Add a leader or callout to the selected annotation feature. If the annotation has a leader defined in its symbol, it will be applied. Otherwise, the leader defined in the Editing Options dialog box is used.

button.caption: Delete Leader
button.extendedCaption: Delete Leader
button.tooltip: Remove the leader or callout line from the selected annotation feature.

button.caption: Convert to Multiple Parts
button.extendedCaption: Convert annotation to multipart
button.tooltip: Convert an annotation feature containing multiple words into a series of single-word elements so you can edit the position of individual words. Spaces are used to determine each part.

button.caption: Convert to Single Part
button.extendedCaption: Convert annotation to single part
button.tooltip: Convert a multipart annotation feature to a single part. The first part determines the location and type of the single-part annotation.

button.caption: Stack
button.extendedCaption: Stack Annotation Text
button.tooltip: Stack the selected annotation feature into two or more lines of text. A space is used as the delimiter for stacking individual words.

button.caption: Unstack
button.extendedCaption: Unstack Annotation Text
button.tooltip: Make the selected annotation feature into a single line of text. A space is used as the delimiter for unstacking individual words.

button.caption: Flip Annotation
button.extendedCaption: Flip Annotation
button.tooltip: Flip the selected annotation feature by 180 degrees.

button.caption: Horizontal
button.extendedCaption: Make Horizontal
button.tooltip: Make the annotation horizontal.

button.caption: Straight
button.extendedCaption: Make Straight
button.tooltip: Make the annotation straight.

button.caption: Curved
button.extendedCaption: Make Curved
button.tooltip: Make the annotation curved.

button.caption: New Group Template
button.extendedCaption: New Group Template.
button.tooltip: Create a new group template using the selected template as primary template.

button.caption: New Group Template
button.extendedCaption: New Group Template.
button.tooltip: Create a new group template using the selected template as primary template.

button.caption: New Group Template
button.extendedCaption: New Group Template.
button.tooltip: Create a new group template using the selected template as primary template.

button.caption: New Group Template
button.extendedCaption: New Group Template.
button.tooltip: Create a new group template using the selected template as primary template.

button.caption: New Group Template
button.extendedCaption: New Group Template.
button.tooltip: Create a new group template using the selected template as primary template.

button.caption: Add to Favorites
button.extendedCaption: Add command to favorites in Modify Features pane.
button.tooltip: Add to favorite commands.

button.caption: Remove from Favorites
button.extendedCaption: Remove command from favorites in Modify Features.
button.tooltip: Remove from favorite commands.

button.caption: Properties
button.extendedCaption: Multipatch Model properties.
button.tooltip: Edit the model properties of the template.

button.caption: Delete all templates
button.tooltip: Delete all the templates in the highlighted map, group layer, or layer.

button.caption: Create all templates
button.extendedCaption: Create new feature templates.
button.tooltip: Create templates automatically for all layers in the highlighted map, group layer, or layer.

customControl.caption: Topology Options
customControl.tooltip: Enable or disable a topology. Enable map topology to edit topological edges and nodes for all layers in the map using tools in the Modify Feature pane. Enable a geodatabase topology to edit topological edges and nodes for layers that participate in that topology using tools in the Modify Feature pane.

customControl.caption: Choose how to add Z
customControl.extendedCaption: Expand CurrentZ to show the choices

tool.caption: Get Z From View
tool.extendedCaption: Get elevation by clicking in a Map or Scene view.

customControl.caption: Map surfaces
customControl.tooltip: Select a surface from the available elevation map surfaces to get Z values from the Map. Available only when elevation surfaces are available and, either Surface Mode is chosen, or Constant mode is chosen and the "Get Z From View" command is active.

customControl.caption: Enter Elevation Values
customControl.tooltip: Enter a value to be set as the constant Z elevation for newly created features. Available only when Constant Mode is chosen.

button.caption: Digitize the ground line and the grid line

tooltip.heading: Ground To Grid Digitize Ground Tool

button.tooltip: Interactively digitize the ground line, then interactively digitize the grid line.

button.caption: Enter the ground line and digitize the grid line

tooltip.heading: Ground To Grid Digitize Grid Tool

button.tooltip: Enter the ground direction and ground distance using a dialog, then interactively digitize the grid line.

tool.caption: Digitize the ground line and the grid line

tooltip.heading: Ground To Grid Digitize Ground Tool

tool.tooltip: Interactively digitize the ground line, then interactively digitize the grid line.

tool.caption: Enter the ground line and digitize the grid line

tooltip.heading: Ground To Grid Digitize Grid Tool

tool.tooltip: Enter the ground direction and ground distance using a dialog, then interactively digitize the grid line.

button.caption: Large Icons
button.extendedCaption: Show edit commands and tools in Modify Feautres using large icons.
button.tooltip: Switch to large icon view.

button.caption: Small Icons
button.extendedCaption: Show edit commands and tools in Modify Feautres using small icons.
button.tooltip: Switch to small icon view.

button.caption: List
button.extendedCaption: Show edit commands and tools in Modify Features pane as a list.
button.tooltip: Switch to list view.

button.caption: Group by function
button.extendedCaption: Group edit commands and tools in Modify Features pane by function.
button.tooltip: Switch between showing list of command and function groups.

button.caption: Flash
button.extendedCaption: Flash selected features (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Flash the selected feature.Can only flash a single feature

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to selected features (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Zoom to the selected feature(s).

button.caption: Pan To
button.extendedCaption: Pan to selected features (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Pan to the selected feature(s).

button.caption: Open Pop-up
button.extendedCaption: Show pop-up for the selected features (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Show a pop-up for the selected features.

button.caption: Open New Pinned Pop-up
button.extendedCaption: Show pinned pop-up for this feature (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Show a pinned pop-up for this feature.

button.caption: Copy Attributes
button.tooltip: Copy Attributes to clipboard.

button.caption: Paste Attributes
button.tooltip: Paste Attributes from clipboard.

button.caption: Unselect
button.tooltip: Remove this feature from the selection.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete selected items (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Delete 'selected' items.

button.caption: Attribute Table
button.extendedCaption: Open Attribute Table (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Open the attribute table for this layer.

button.caption: Attribute Table Showing Selection
button.extendedCaption: Open Attribute Table showing selection (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Open the attribute table for this layer to show the selected features.

button.caption: New Template From Feature

tooltip.heading: Create New Template from selected feature

button.tooltip: Create a new feature template based on the feature you select in your map.

button.caption: Layer Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected layers.

button.caption: Standalone Table Properties
button.tooltip: Show the properties for the selected table.

button.caption: Clear Selection
button.extendedCaption: Clear selected features (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Deselect all currently selected features.

button.caption: Select
button.extendedCaption: Select feature (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Add this feature to the selection.

button.caption: Only Select This
button.tooltip: Remove all other features from the selection.

button.caption: Remove From Relationship
button.tooltip: Remove this feature or record from the relationship with the related feature or record. This does not delete the feature or record from the table.

button.caption: Add Selected To Relationship
button.tooltip: Add this feature to the relationship with the related feature or record. Requires a relationship class.

button.caption: Add New To Relationship
button.tooltip: Add a new nonspatial object to the relationship for the selected feature.

button.caption: Remove All From Relationship
button.tooltip: Remove all features or records from this relationship.

button.caption: Add To Map
button.extendedCaption: Add related layer or table to map (Attribute pane context menu item).
button.tooltip: Add the related feature layer or table to the map.

button.caption: Move to Target
button.extendedCaption: Move the highlighted feature(s) to the target selection.
button.tooltip: Move the highlighted feature(s) to the target selection.

button.caption: Move to Input
button.extendedCaption: Move the highlighted feature(s) to the input selection.
button.tooltip: Move the highlighted feature(s) to the input selection.

button.caption: To Line
button.extendedCaption: Change line segment to be straight.
button.tooltip: Change this segment to a straight line.Disabled if the segment is already a line.

button.caption: To Circular Arc
button.extendedCaption: Change line segment to be circular.
button.tooltip: Change this segment to a circular arc.Disabled if the segment is already an arc.

button.caption: To Bezier Curve
button.extendedCaption: Change line segment to be Bezier curve.
button.tooltip: Change this segment to a bezier curve.Disabled if the segment is already a curve.

button.caption: Set Editing Options
button.extendedCaption: Set editing options.
button.tooltip: Set editing options.

button.caption: Add To Feature Class
button.tooltip: Add To Feature Class. This tool consumes credits when used with the ArcGIS World Geocoding Service.

button.caption: Rematch Addresses...
button.tooltip: Review and rematch the addresses in this feature class.

button.caption: Attribute Table
button.extendedCaption: Open Attribute Table for a layer.
button.tooltip: Open the attribute table for this layer.

button.caption: Table From Selection
button.extendedCaption: Open Attribute Table for a layer showing selection.
button.tooltip: Open the attribute table for this layer to show the selected features.

button.caption: Attribute Table Showing Selection
button.extendedCaption: Open Attribute Table showing selection for a layer.
button.tooltip: Open the attribute table for this layer to show the selected features.

button.caption: Open
button.extendedCaption: Open standalone Table.
button.tooltip: Open a viewer for the selected table.

button.caption: Show All
button.extendedCaption: Show all fields for this table.
button.tooltip: Show all fields for this table.

button.caption: Aliases
button.extendedCaption: Show field aliases for this table.
button.tooltip: Show field aliases instead of (database) field names for this table.

button.caption: Fields
button.extendedCaption: Shows the fields view for the table in the active table view.
button.tooltip: Show the fields view for the current table.

button.caption: Add
button.extendedCaption: Add a new field in this table.
button.tooltip: Add a new field in this table.The project has unsaved edits or the table is read only.

button.caption: Copy
button.tooltip: Copy selected rows to the clipboard.

button.caption: Sort Ascending
button.extendedCaption: Sort field ascending
button.tooltip: Sort the values in this field from lowest to highest (A-Z or 1-9).

button.caption: Sort Descending
button.extendedCaption: Sort field descending.
button.tooltip: Sort the values in this field from highest to lowest (Z-A or 9-1).

button.caption: Custom Sort...
button.extendedCaption: Custom field sorting.
button.tooltip: Sort the table by multiple fields or make the sort case sensitive.

button.caption: Time
button.extendedCaption: Filter the table by time.
button.tooltip: Only show records that fall within the current map time.The table is not time enabled.

button.caption: Range
button.extendedCaption: Filter the table by range.
button.tooltip: Only show records that fall within the current map range.The table is not range enabled.

button.caption: Extent
button.extendedCaption: Filter the table by extent.
button.tooltip: Only show records that fall within the current map extent.The map must be 2D in order to filter the table by extent.

button.caption: Statistics
button.extendedCaption: Generate statistics report within table.
button.tooltip: Generate a report of statistics for the selected values in this numeric field. If any of the rows in the table are currently selected, statistics will only be generated for the selected rows.Disabled if the field is not numeric.

button.caption: Calculate Field
button.extendedCaption: Calculate field values within a table.
button.tooltip: Set the values of this field by specifying a calculation expression. If any of the rows in the table are currently selected, only the values of the selected rows will be calculated.The project has unsaved edits, there is no field selected, or the table is read only.

button.caption: Calculate Geometry
button.extendedCaption: Calculate geometry values within a table.
button.tooltip: Set the values of this field by specifying a geometry property of the features, such as x-coordinate, y-coordinate, length, area, or number of vertices. If any of the rows in the table are currently selected, only the values of the selected rows will be calculated.This table or field does not support Calculate Geometry.

button.caption: Summarize
button.extendedCaption: Create a summary table.
button.tooltip: Create a summary table grouped by the values in the current field. If any of the rows in the table are currently selected, only the values of the selected rows will be calculated.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete a field from a table.
button.tooltip: Delete selected field(s) from this table.The project has unsaved edits, there is no field selected, or the table is read only.

button.caption: Hide Field
button.tooltip: Turn selected field(s) off to not show here or in any other dialog.

button.caption: Add Join
button.tooltip: Join data to this layer or standalone table based on a common attribute.Joins are not available for subtype layers.

button.caption: Remove Join
button.tooltip: Remove joined data from the current table.

button.caption: Remove All Joins
button.tooltip: Remove all joined data from the current table.

button.caption: Add Relate
button.tooltip: Relate data to this layer or standalone table based on a common attribute. Unlike a join, a relate does not append data to the layer or standalone table.Relates are not available for subtype layers.

button.caption: Remove Relate
button.tooltip: Remove the relate from the current table.

button.caption: Remove All Relates
button.tooltip: Remove all relates from the current table.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom map to selected features within table.
button.tooltip: Zoom in and center the map on the extent of the features in the selected rows.Make sure there are features selected. If that does not work, try clicking the map to initialize it before zooming.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to the feature in the current row within table.
button.tooltip: Zoom in and center the map on the feature in the current row.Must have an initialized map view. Click the map view to initialize it.

button.caption: Pan To
button.extendedCaption: Pan map to selected features within table.
button.tooltip: Center the map around the features in the selected rows.Make sure there are features selected. If that does not work, try clicking the map to initialize it before zooming.

button.caption: Pan To
button.extendedCaption: Pan to feature in the current row within table.
button.tooltip: Pan the map to the feature in the current row.Must have an initialized map view. Click the map view to initialize it.

button.caption: Flash
button.extendedCaption: Flash in map the feature in the current row within table
button.tooltip: Flash the shape of the feature in the map.Must have an initialized map view. Click the map view to initialize it.

button.caption: Manage Attachments
button.extendedCaption: Open Attachments manager for the current row in the table.
button.tooltip: Open Attachments Manager.

button.caption: All
button.extendedCaption: Select all rows within table.
button.tooltip: Select all rows.

button.caption: Switch
button.extendedCaption: Switch selected rows within table.
button.tooltip: Switch selected rows.

button.caption: Clear
button.extendedCaption: Clear selected rows within table.
button.tooltip: Deselect all the currently selected rows.

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete selected rows within table.
button.tooltip: Delete selected rows from the table.

button.caption: Delete Row
button.extendedCaption: Delete this row in the table.
button.tooltip: Delete current row from the table.

button.caption: Select/Unselect
button.extendedCaption: Toggle selection of this row in the table.
button.tooltip: Toggle selection of the current row.

button.caption: Highlight/Unhighlight
button.extendedCaption: Toggle highlight of this row in the table.
button.tooltip: Toggle highlight of the current row.

button.caption: Pop-up
button.extendedCaption: Show pop-up for this row in the table.
button.tooltip: View focused information about the contents of layers within a configurable pop-up window.

button.caption: Pinned Pop-up
button.extendedCaption: Show pinned pop-up for this row in the table.
button.tooltip: View focused information about the contents of layers within a configurable pinned pop-up window.

button.caption: Map All Suggestions
button.extendedCaption: Map all geocoded candidates - Context Menu Item
button.tooltip: Display all suggested candidates on the map.

button.caption: Default Sort Order
button.extendedCaption: Restore default sort for geocoded candidates - Context Menu Item
button.tooltip: Reset sorting of the results to the default order defined by the locator - by score for an individual locator; and by the order of the participating locators listed in a composite locator and then by score.

button.caption: Matched Addresses with Score 80 - 100
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: Matched Addresses with Score below 80
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: Unmatched Addresses
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: Matched Addresses with Candidates Tied
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: Unmatched Addresses with Candidates Tied
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: Custom Query
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: All Addresses
button.extendedCaption: Rematch addresses filter - Context Menu Item

button.caption: Export Features
button.extendedCaption: Active table view
button.tooltip: Convert a shapefile or geodatabase feature class to a shapefile or geodatabase feature class.The selected item is not a feature layer or this layer item does not support the export data capability.

button.caption: Export Table
button.extendedCaption: Active table view
button.tooltip: Export current table to new table.This layer or standalone table item does not support the export data capability.

button.caption: Select By Attributes
button.extendedCaption: Active table view
button.tooltip: Select features by their attribute values.

button.caption: Reconcile
button.extendedCaption: Reconcile the selected layer, table or datasource's version against an ancestor version.
button.tooltip: Reconcile the versions.Reconcile disabled.

button.caption: Post
button.extendedCaption: Post the reconciled changes of the selected layer, table or datasource's version to the reconcile target version.
button.tooltip: Post the versions.Post the versions once all versions are reconciled.

button.caption: Conflict Manager
button.extendedCaption: View conflicts present after reconciling for the selected layer, table or datasource's version.
button.tooltip: View conflicts.No conflicts.

button.caption: Version Changes
button.extendedCaption: View changes between the current version and a target version for the selected layer, table or datasource's version.
button.tooltip: View changes.Unable to view changes.

button.caption: Refresh
button.extendedCaption: Refresh the version of the selected layer, table or datasource.
button.tooltip: Refresh the layers in the map for the current selection.Refresh disabled.

button.caption: Error Inspector
button.extendedCaption: Topology Error Inspector
button.tooltip: Show the Error Inspector. This enables you to find, sort and fix geodatabase topology errors.

button.caption: Error Inspector
button.extendedCaption: Parcel Error Inspector
button.tooltip: Show the Error Inspector. This enables you to find, sort and fix parcel fabric errors.

button.caption: Error Inspector
button.tooltip: Show the Error Inspector. This enables you to find, sort and fix errors.

button.caption: Error Inspector
button.extendedCaption: Geodatabase Validation Error Inspector
button.tooltip: Show the Error Inspector. This enables you to find, sort and fix geodatabase validation errors.

button.caption: Validate All
button.tooltip: Identify topology errors and symbolize them on layers in the current map.

button.caption: Validate Extent
button.tooltip: Identify topology errors and symbolize them on layers in the current map extent.

button.caption: Flash
button.extendedCaption: Flash in map the error feature in the current row within table
button.tooltip: Flash the shape of the error feature in the map.Must have an initialized map view. Click the map view to initialize it.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to the error feature in the current row within table.
button.tooltip: Zoom in and center the map on the error feature in the current row.Must have an initialized map view. Click the map view to initialize it.

button.caption: Pan To
button.extendedCaption: Pan to error feature in the current row within table.
button.tooltip: Pan the map to the error feature in the current row.Must have an initialized map view. Click the map view to initialize it.

button.caption: Pop-up
button.extendedCaption: Show pop-up for this row in the table.
button.tooltip: View focused information about the error feature in the current row within a configurable pop-up window.This function is not yet implemented.

button.caption: Select/Unselect
button.extendedCaption: Toggle selection of this row in the table.
button.tooltip: Toggle selection of the current row.

button.caption: All
button.extendedCaption: Select all error rows within table.
button.tooltip: Select all rows.

button.caption: Switch
button.extendedCaption: Switch selected error rows within table.
button.tooltip: Switch selected rows.

button.caption: Clear
button.extendedCaption: Clear selected error rows within table.
button.tooltip: Deselect all the currently selected rows.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom map to selected errors within table.
button.tooltip: Zoom in and center the map on the extent of the errors in the selected rows.Make sure there are error features selected. If that does not work, try clicking the map to initialize it before zooming.

button.caption: Mark As Exception
button.tooltip: Mark the selected errors as exceptions.

button.caption: Clear Exception
button.tooltip: Mark the selected errors as errors.

button.caption: Validate Extent
button.tooltip: Identify topology errors and symbolize them on layers in the current map extent.

button.caption: Features
button.tooltip: Select the features that created the errors in the selected rows.

button.caption: Map Extent
button.tooltip: Show errors in the current map extent.

button.caption: Rules
button.tooltip: Enable filtering for topology rules.

button.caption: Rule Description...
button.tooltip: View a description and an example graphic of the rule violated by this error.

button.caption: Remove Overlap
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Remove Overlap Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Remove the overlapping portion of the feature that is causing the error.

button.caption: Remove Segment
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Remove Segment Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Remove the segment of the line feature that is causing the error. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Create Feature
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Create Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Create a new feature from the error shape. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Merge
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB TopologyMerge Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Merge the overlap into one feature and remove it from the others. Choose which feature receives the overlapping portion on the dialog box that appears. This fix can be applied to one error only.

button.caption: Merge to Largest
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Merge to Largest Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Merge the shortest line into the longest line, retaining the attributes of the longest line feature. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Delete Feature
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Delete Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Delete the feature causing the topology error. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Split
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Split Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Split the features where they intersect. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Extend
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Extend Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Extend the line to snap to the nearest line feature within the specified distance. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Trim
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Trim Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Trim the line to the nearest intersecting line feature within the specified distance. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Snap
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Snap Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Snap the dangling line feature to the nearest line within the specified tolerance. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Simplify
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Simplify Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Remove self-overlapping or self-intersecting line segments from the feature causing the error. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.Coming Soon

button.caption: Explode
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Explode Feature Fix Method
button.tooltip: Create a separate feature for each part of the multipart feature. This fix can be applied to one or more errors.

button.caption: Create Record
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Create Record Fix Method
button.tooltip: Create a record for the parcel.

button.caption: Build
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Build Fix Method
button.tooltip: Build the parcel.

button.caption: Planarize
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Planarize Fix Method
button.tooltip: Planarize features.

button.caption: Associate To Valid Parcel
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Associate To Valid Parcel Fix Method
button.tooltip: Associate to a valid parcel.

button.caption: Assign To Active Record
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Assign To Active Record Fix Method
button.tooltip: Assign to active record.

button.caption: No Fix Available
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology No Fix Method
button.tooltip: A predefined topology solution is not available. Use other tools to fix the error.

button.caption: Mark as Exception
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Mark as Exception Method
button.tooltip: Mark an error as an exception.

button.caption: Clear Exception
button.extendedCaption: Editing GDB Topology Mark as Error Method
button.tooltip: Clear the exception.

button.caption: Rule Description...
button.extendedCaption: Fix tool Rule
button.tooltip: View a description and an example graphic of the rule violated by this error.

tool.caption: Set Origin
tool.tooltip: Set the origin for the grid.

button.caption: Set Origin
button.extendedCaption: Grid Set Origin Command
button.tooltip: Set the origin for the grid.

tool.caption: Set Rotation
tool.tooltip: Set the rotation for the grid.

button.caption: Set Rotation
button.extendedCaption: Grid Set Rotation Command
button.tooltip: Set the rotation for the grid.

tool.caption: Set Origin and Rotation
tool.tooltip: Set the origin and rotation for the grid.

button.caption: Set Origin and Rotation
button.extendedCaption: Grid Set Origin and Rotation Command
button.tooltip: Set the origin and rotation for the grid.

button.caption: Commit
button.tooltip: Commit origin and rotation changes.

button.caption: Cancel
button.tooltip: Cancel origin and rotation changes.

button.caption: Show Only Active
button.tooltip: Click to show only parcels in the active record. Show Only Active can be toggled on or off. If Show Only Active is toggled off, you can set the transparency of parcels that are not part of the active record.Available only when an active record is set.

button.caption: Show Only Active On
button.tooltip: Click to show only parcels in the active record. If Show Only Active is toggled off, you can set the transparency of parcels that are not part of the active record.Available only when an active record is set.

button.caption: Show Only Active Off
button.tooltip: Click to stop showing only parcels in the active record. If Show Only Active is toggled off, you can set the transparency of parcels that are not part of the active record.Available only when an active record is set.

button.caption: Manage
button.tooltip: Search for records by typing a record name or using a search query.

button.caption: New
button.tooltip: Create a new parcel fabric record. Records store information about the legal record such as record type and recorded date. Parcels are organized in the parcel fabric by their associated record.

button.caption: Select Features
button.tooltip: Click to select all features in the active record.Available only when an active record is set.

customControl.caption: Active Record
customControl.tooltip: Click to toggle the active record on or off. If you are doing a record-driven workflow, toggle the active record on and choose the record to set as active. New parcels are added to the active record.

tool.caption: Align
tool.tooltip: Align Features closes gaps between adjacent parcel polyline or polygon features using buffer tolerance.

tool.caption: Show
tool.tooltip: Show parcel adj buffer...

customControl.caption: Enter Alignment Value
customControl.tooltip: Enter a search buffer value that's used to find features to align. Available only when there is an active parcel record.

button.caption: Switch
button.tooltip: Switch parcel selection.Available only when there are selected parcels or parcel lines.

button.caption: Trace
button.tooltip: Trace the feature to which to align selected parcels.Available only when there are selected parcels.

button.caption: Switch Gallery Size
button.extendedCaption: Switch parcel gallery size.
button.tooltip: Switch between small and large icons.

button.caption: Customize...
button.extendedCaption: Tool gallery
button.tooltip: Add groups, reorder, or remove the tools in the Tool gallery.

button.caption: Zoom To Records
button.tooltip: Zoom and pan the map to the selected records.

button.caption: Pan To Records
button.tooltip: Pan the map to the selected records.

button.caption: Select Records
button.tooltip: Select the records in the map.

button.caption: Attribute Table Showing Selection
button.tooltip: Open and select the records in the attribute table.

button.caption: Set Active Record
button.tooltip: Click to toggle the active record on or off. If you are doing a record-driven workflow, toggle the active record on and choose the record to set as active. New parcels are added to the active record.More than one record is selected. Select only one record.

button.caption: Select Parcel Features
button.tooltip: Click to select all features in this selected records.

button.caption: Assign Selection To Record
button.tooltip: Assign the selected parcel features to the selected record.No parcel features are selected or more than one record is selected. Select at least one parcel feature and only one record.

button.caption: Delete Records
button.tooltip: Delete the selected records. Parcels associated with the records are not deleted.

button.caption: Properties
button.tooltip: Show Record Properties.More than one record is selected. Select only one record.

menu.caption: Point Sketch Context Menu for AnnotationTemplate
Point Sketch Context Menu for Fillet
Line Sketch Context Menu for Annotation Template
Curvature
menu.tooltip: Change the curvature type of the annotation.

menu.caption: Sort
menu.tooltip: Sort the tables values by ascending or descending order, or apply custom sorting to multiple fields.

menu.caption: Joins
menu.tooltip: Menu to create, remove, or remove all joins.

menu.caption: Relates
menu.tooltip: Menu to create, remove, or remove all relates.

menu.caption: Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Larger Than Cluster Tolerance
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Have Gaps
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Overlap
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Covered By Feature Class Of
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Cover Each Other
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Covered By
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Overlap With
Editing GDB Topology Error Contains One Point
Editing GDB Topology Error Boundary Must be Covered By
Editing GDB Topology Error Area Boundary Must Be Covered By Boundary Of
Editing GDB Topology Error Contains Point
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Covered By Boundary Of
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Inside
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Overlap
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Intersect
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Have Dangles
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Have Pseudo Nodes
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Covered By Feature Class Of
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Overlap With
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Self-Overlap
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Self-Intersect
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Self-Intersect (Point)
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Intersect Or Touch Interior
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Intersect Or Touch Interior (Point)
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Intersect Or Touch Interior (Line)
Editing GDB Topology Error Endpoint Must Be Covered By
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Single Part
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Intersect With
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Not Intersect Or Touch Interior With
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Covered By Boundary Of
Editing GDB Topology Error Must Be Properly Inside
Editing GDB Topology Error Point Must Be Covered By Line
Editing GDB Topology Error Point Must Be Covered By Endpoint Of
Editing GDB Topology Error Point Must Be Disjoint
Editing GDB Topology Error Point Must Coincide With
Editing GDB Topology Error Record Needs Additional Geometry
Editing GDB Topology Error Record Needs Subtracted Geometry
Editing GDB Topology Error Parcels Must Have A Record
Editing GDB Topology Error Parcel Must Have Non-empty Record ID
Editing GDB Topology Error Parcel Polygons Must Have Their Own Parcel Lines
Editing GDB Topology Error Parcel Lines Must Be Associated To A Parcel Polygon
Editing GDB Topology Error Parcel Lines Must Not Overlap With Other Parcel Lines
Editing GDB Topology Error Parcel Lines Refer To A Parcel That Does Not Exist
